alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:25PM EST until January 31 at 8:52AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at South Boston. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Highway 501 between Route 58 and the Dan River is closed as it is covered by up to 2 feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EST Monday was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.6 feet on 01/07/1992. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 930 AM EST.
